game.name: Return from Core
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, Steam 트레이딩 카드, Steam 창작마당, 컨트롤러 일부 지원, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Mine, build, and explore with Monster Girl companions in this underground sandbox adventure. Uncover lost tech, automate production, and forge bonds with allies as you fight to survive and journey back to the surface.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Mine, build, and explore with Monster Girl companions in this underground sandbox adventure. Uncover lost tech, automate production, and forge bonds with allies as you fight to survive and journey back to the surface.

reviewHighlights.text: 코어키퍼 맛 보려 샀는데 뭔가 좀 아직 아쉬워서 코어키퍼 다회차가 더 재밌을듯..
